/mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Implementation of deep learning in liver pathology optimizes diagnosis of benign lesions and adenocarcinoma metastasis/crops_ordered/page_06/region_02_text.png
regions.text:
FIGURE 2 _ Examples of image tiles. Image tiles 100 x 100 ym in size from colorectal adenocarinoma (A), pancreatic adenocarcinoma
(B), benign bile duct lesions (C), necrosis (D), hepatic cells (E), bile duct (F) and connective tissue (G) are displayed.

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Implementation of deep learning in liver pathology optimizes diagnosis of benign lesions and adenocarcinoma metastasis/crops_ordered/page_06/region_03_text.png
regions.text:
package tensorflow_addons) and the macro average of the
area under the receiver operating characteristics curve
(AUC_MA) (cf. ‘keras.metrics. AUC’ in python package
tensorflow) to indicate overall prediction accuracy. Each
model was proposed with different input image sizes and
we resized our tiles to the particular size a model required
via the TensorFlow function tf.image.resize.

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Implementation of deep learning in liver pathology optimizes diagnosis of benign lesions and adenocarcinoma metastasis/crops_ordered/page_06/region_04_text.png
regions.text:
The baseline model (EfficientNetV2BO) was trained
with a learning rate of .01 and .001, an input size of
260 X 260 px, a dropout of .2 and M = 10 for random
augmentation.

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Implementation of deep learning in liver pathology optimizes diagnosis of benign lesions and adenocarcinoma metastasis/crops_ordered/page_06/region_05_text.png
regions.text:
Next, we scaled up, that is, input size, network depth
and width. In particular, we used the S instead of the BO
architecture (EfficientNetV2S). These models were trained
with learning rates .01, .001 and .0001 and an input size of
384 X 384 px.

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Implementation of deep learning in liver pathology optimizes diagnosis of benign lesions and adenocarcinoma metastasis/crops_ordered/page_06/region_06_text.png
regions.text:
Last, the ResNetRS50 architecture was trained with
learning rates .01, .001 and .0001, each with an input size
of 224 x 224 px.

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Implementation of deep learning in liver pathology optimizes diagnosis of benign lesions and adenocarcinoma metastasis/crops_ordered/page_06/region_07_text.png
regions.text:
We compared the different configurations (application
and learning rates) by plotting the respective best epochs

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Implementation of deep learning in liver pathology optimizes diagnosis of benign lesions and adenocarcinoma metastasis/crops_ordered/page_06/region_08_text.png
regions.text:
for each trained model. In particular, for each model we
plotted the five best epochs according to the validation
AUC_MA and the five best epochs according to MCC.
Moreover, the training times were compared between the
three architectures as a surrogate for the inference time.

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Implementation of deep learning in liver pathology optimizes diagnosis of benign lesions and adenocarcinoma metastasis/crops_ordered/page_06/region_09_text.png
regions.text:
To evaluate the performance of the models, confusion
matrices for image tiles and patients were created and
compared for validation and test data. Each confusion
matrix shows the number of tiles in respective actual and
predicted class, along with the percentage of actual tiles
affected. That is, the percentages in a row add up to 100%.
For case-based results, majority prediction of all tiles of a
specific class was calculated from that case. That is, a case
is composed of all tiles of a specific class (by annotation of
a pathologist) from a specific whole slide. We excluded the
EfficientNetV2S architecture form this evaluation, since its
performance was not significantly better compared to the
other models, but training times were much higher.

regions.crop_image_path: /mnt/sh_flex_storage/home/zehanyu/repos/GPT-Paper/pdfs/cancer_review/Implementation of deep learning in liver pathology optimizes diagnosis of benign lesions and adenocarcinoma metastasis/crops_ordered/page_06/region_10_text.png
regions.text:
To visualize the similarity of the different classes, the
uniform manifold approximation and projection (UMAP)
was plotted of the activation layer just before the top dense
